data.text:
Sarah D. Kennedy OBITUARY

SARAH D. “DORIS” KENNEDY Entered peacefully into rest at home on September 23, 2002, with her family at her side. Born on June 1, 1919 in Norristown, PA, she was 83 years of age. Doris worked as a instructor’s aide for the San Lorenzo Unified School District for 15 years. Devoted to her faith she served as a Eucharist Minister at St. John’s Catholic Church. She also was a member of the St. Gerard’s Women’s Club, a volunteer for the C.I.A. program and the aid’s ministry at St. John’s. Her hobbies included reading and traveling. She was the beloved wife of the late James W. “Bill” Kennedy who preceded her in death in 1994. She is survived by her loving children Kate Ingoglia of Sacramento, Maureen Kennedy of Mtn View, Brian Kennedy of Arizona, Mary Rose Wagner of Turlock and Patrick Kennedy of Danville. Doris was also preceded in death by her sons Christopher in 2001 and Kevin in 2000. She is also survived by 11 grandchildren and her sister Marcella Bailey in addition to many nieces and nephews. Visitation for Doris will be held on Thursday from 6PM to 7PM at St. Johns Catholic Church, 264 E. Lewelling Blvd., San Lorenzo. A funeral mass will be held starting at 7PM. Private family burial will take place on Friday at Holy Sepulchre Cemetery in Hayward. In Lieu of flowers the family is requesting donations to the St. Vincent de Paul Dining Room. GRISSOM’S Chapel/Mortuary 510-278-2800 www.grissomsmortuary.com
